item.description:
Level 2 Shamballa Long Distance Healing Attunement/Class- 7:00- 10:00 pm

Come and learn how to send long distance energy, to other people, animals, plants, situations and events,
positively charge your food, medicines and crystals, and how to use Shamballa with everyday magick.

$50.00- (cash or checkl)

Class paperwork, Shamballa booklet, grounding snacks included.

**************************************************************

Please note you must have already taken Shamballa Level 1 to attend this class.

**************************************************************
item.how_to_find_us: Park on the main street, and come in the door! :)
item.name: Shamballa Level 2- Hands on Healing & More!
